org.numenta.nupic.research

Class Parameters

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.numenta.nupic.research.Parameters

  • public class Parameters
extends java.lang.Object
    Specifies parameters to be used as a configuration for a given TemporalMemory
    Author:
    David Ray
    See Also:
    TemporalMemory, ComputeCycle

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  Parameters.KEY
      Constant values representing configuration parameters for the TemporalMemory

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private int activationThreshold
      If the number of active connected synapses on a segment is at least this threshold, the segment is said to be active.
      private int cellsPerColumn
      Total number of cells per column
      private int columnDimensions
      Total number of columns
      private double connectedPermanence
      If the permanence value for a synapse is greater than this value, it is said to be connected.
      private double initialPermanence
      Initial permanence of a new synapse
      private int learningRadius
      Radius around cell from which it can sample to form distal Dendrite connections.
      private int maxNewSynapseCount
      The maximum number of synapses added to a segment during learning.
      private int minThreshold
      If the number of synapses active on a segment is at least this threshold, it is selected as the best matching cell in a bursting column.
      private java.util.EnumMap<Parameters.KEY,java.lang.Number> paramMap
      Map of parameters to their values
      private double permanenceDecrement
      Amount by which permanences of synapses are decremented during learning.
      private double permanenceIncrement
      Amount by which permanences of synapses are incremented during learning.
      private java.util.Random random
      Random Number Generator
      private int seed
      Seed for random number generator

        Total number of columns

      • cellsPerColumn

        private int cellsPerColumn

      • activationThreshold

        private int activationThreshold
        If the number of active connected synapses on a segment is at least this threshold, the segment is said to be active.

      • learningRadius

        private int learningRadius
        Radius around cell from which it can sample to form distal Dendrite connections.

      • minThreshold

        private int minThreshold
        If the number of synapses active on a segment is at least this threshold, it is selected as the best matching cell in a bursting column.

      • maxNewSynapseCount

        private int maxNewSynapseCount
        The maximum number of synapses added to a segment during learning.

        private int seed
        Seed for random number generator

        Initial permanence of a new synapse

    • Method Detail

      • getMap

        public java.util.EnumMap<Parameters.KEY,java.lang.Number> getMap()
        Creates and returns an EnumMap containing the specified keys; whose values are to be loaded later. The map returned is only created if the internal reference is null (never been created), therefore the map is a singleton which cannot be recreated once created.
        Returns:
